statements: SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE data_breached = TRUE ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM cybersecurity_incidents ORDER BY incident_type;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type, affected_systems FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE response_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, data_breached FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE affected_systems > 50 ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Phishing' AND data_breached = TRUE
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE affected_systems > 10 ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT AVG(affected_systems) AS avg_affected_systems FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE attacker_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_incidents;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT affected_system, breach_method FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incident_details ORDER BY reported_by DESC;
SELECT description FROM incident_details WHERE detail_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_date, incident_type, affected_system FROM cybersecurity_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, affected_system, breach_method FROM cybersecurity_incidents WHERE incident_type LIKE '%Hack%' AND breach_method = 'Phishing' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_details WHERE reported_by = 'Anonymous';

SELECT cybersecurity_incidents.incident_date, incident_details.description, incident_details.reported_by FROM cybersecurity_incidents INNER JOIN incident_details ON cybersecurity_incidents.incident_id = incident_details.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT location_id, country, city FROM locations WHERE city IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity_level > 2 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' LIMIT 5;
SELECT description, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE severity_level = 1 AND description ILIKE '%fire%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY username;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type, severity_level FROM incidents JOIN locations ON incidents.id = locations.location_id WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM incidents
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents
SELECT victim_name, victim_organization, victim_ip_address FROM victims
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT attacker_name, attacker_type FROM attackers
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND severity >= 8;

SELECT i.incident_id, v.victim_name, v.victim_organization, l.city, l.country FROM incidents AS i JOIN victims AS v ON i.incident_id = v.incident_id JOIN locations AS l ON i.incident_id = l.location_id WHERE v.victim_organization LIKE '%Bank%' ORDER BY i.incident_date ASC;

SELECT a.attacker_name, a.attacker_type, i.incident_date, i.description FROM attackers AS a JOIN incidents AS i ON a.incident_id = i.incident_id WHERE a.attacker_type = 'Hacker' ORDER BY i.incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT v.victim_name, v.victim_ip_address, i.incident_type, l.city FROM victims AS v JOIN incidents AS i ON v.incident_id = i.incident_id JOIN locations AS l ON i.incident_id = l.location_id WHERE l.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, entity_location FROM entities WHERE entity_type = 'Company' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT hacker_name, hacker_country FROM hackers WHERE hacker_country = 'Russia';
SELECT investigation_date, investigator_name FROM investigations WHERE investigator_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY investigation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, incident_type ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_description, affected_entities FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, entity_location FROM entities WHERE entity_type = 'Company' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT hacker_name, hacker_country, hacking_method FROM hackers WHERE hacker_country IN ('US', 'UK', 'CA');
SELECT investigation_date, investigator_name FROM investigations WHERE investigator_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY investigation_date DESC;
